item.title: Sustaining Growth With The Three Horizons Model for Innovation
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hill
item.description:
In 2000, Consultants from McKinsey & Company, Inc proposed a portfolio management approach known as the Three Horizons. Each horizon describes the maturity and relative risk of projects, and is a way to allow companies to manage a portfolio of projects for current and future growth. The model was first introduced in the book “The Alchemy …
